name: sophisticated
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: having a good understanding of the way people behave and/or a good knowledge of culture and fashion
trans_examp.trans_cn: 精于世故的，老练的；见多识广的；很有品位的

example.eg: She was slim, svelte, and sophisticated.
example.egtrans: 她身材苗条，体态娇美，处事练达。

example.eg: I don't think I have any books that would suit your sophisticated tastes.
example.egtrans: 我认为我没有什么书能满足你那高雅的品位。

example.eg: He was older than me and from London and I thought him very sophisticated.
example.egtrans: 他比我大，而且来自伦敦，我觉得他为人很老练。

trans_examp.trans_en: intelligent or made in a complicated way and therefore able to do complicated tasks

example.eg: I think a more sophisticated approach is needed to solve this problem.
example.egtrans: 我认为要解决这个问题需要更为高明的方法。

example.eg: These are among the most sophisticated weapons in the world.
example.egtrans: 这些属于世界上最尖端的武器。
